meanings.definition: The act of affixing or attaching something
meanings.sent1: The affixment of the stamp to the envelope was quick and easy.
meanings.sent2: She carefully checked the affixment of the poster to the wall.
meanings.sent3: The affixment of the sticker to his forehead caused everyone to laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her affixment of the blame on him was unfair.
meanings.sent5: The affixment of the key to the keychain made it easier to find.

meanings.definition: The state of being affixed or attached
meanings.sent1: The affixment of the label to the bottle was secure.
meanings.sent2: The affixment of the photo to the frame was crooked.
meanings.sent3: His affixment to the idea of going to the party was unwavering.
meanings.sent4: The affixment of her gaze on the painting showed her admiration.
meanings.sent5: The affixment of the magnet to the fridge was strong.
